full_description: Hooray Agency is a full-service advertising agency based in Irvine that is seeking a Jr Front End Developer who is motivated and a self-starter.This position requires a highly focused individual who can maintain and support a large workload of many small to medium maintenance-related tasks for a substantial portfolio of website clients. Understanding of website coding best practices is a must.Proficient in languages: HTML, CSS, JavaScriptProficient in programs: Photoshop, DreamweaverFamiliarity with CSS Preprocessors (Sass)Familiarity with version control systemsMust be able to: Update website content through front end code editing and using proprietary content management systemsUnderstand and be able to edit responsive website codeUnderstanding of responsive email coding and cross-client compatibilityImage cropping and implementation for website maintenanceAble to build from scratch, hand-coded, responsive websitesBeneficial skills but not mandatory: Video editing skills to be used on websites, social media, various public uses (LCD displays, etc.)Must be: Collaborative/Strong communicator – written/verbal skillsMotivated/Self-StarterStrong attention to detailJob Type: Full-timeBenefits:Health insurancePaid time offParental leaveSchedule:8 hour shiftCOVID-19 considerations:Due to COVID-19, we are currently working from home. All guidelines will be followed when employees return to work.Work Location:One locationWork Remotely:Yes, temporarily due to COVID-19
